item.title: California's controversial wealth tax proposal leaves billionaires with little way out
item.description: The Billionaire Tax Act would impose a one-time tax of 5% on the total wealth of California tax residents whose net worth is $1 billion or more.

item.title: Inside California's billionaire tax: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the details of California's proposed billionaire tax.

item.title: Vista Equity Partners says its 'agentic factory' is reinventing the way companies use AI
item.description: Vista's aggressive bet on applications and agentic software highlights one of the fastest-growing corners of the AI trade and alternative investments.
